name: Two-Ality (GGJ22 - FGJ)
description:
Two-Ality

Controls:

A/D - move left/right

Space - Jump

Q - Switch control

R - Restart room

M - Toggle music on/off

ESC - Quit to menu

Global Game Jam 2022

Finnish Game Jam branch entry by Eero Höök

Theme: Duality

Theme usage: You control two entities that behave differently, to overcome obstacles

Genre: 2D Platformer

Diversifiers:

20th Century Gaming: Your game's visuals are in the style of games from a device released before the year 2000

Features:

- Catchy music from opengameart (Wolfgang)

- 3 handcrafted levels

- Simplistic retroesque visuals

Support the Dev:

paypal.me/roikkudev
